titleStmt.title: An introduction for to lerne to recken with the pen or with the counters, accordyng to the trewe cast of algorisme, in hole numbers or in broken, newly corrected. And certayne notable and goodly rules of false positions thereunto added, not before sene in our Englyshe tonge, by the which all maner of difficile questions may easely be dissolued and assoyled. Anno. 1546.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Aldersgate strete by Ihon Herford],

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
